title: ICustomPropertyManager.Set
signature:
System.Int32 Set( 
   System.String
FieldName
,

)

parameters.name: FieldName

parameters.name: FieldValue
parameters.description: Value for the existing custom property

returns: 0 if the value for the existing custom property is set 1 if the value for the existing custom property is not set -1 if the custom property does not exist
